remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将修整多余的斜杠标记字符创建格式正确的路径。This method trims excess slash-mark characters to create a properly formatted path. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CombinePath`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CombinePath` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |合并的目录路径和文件名称Combine a directory path and file name|[如何：分析文件路径How to: Parse File Paths](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-parse-file-paths.md)| ## Examples 此示例将合并创建格式正确的路径的目录路径和文件名称。This example combines a directory path and file name to create a properly formatted path. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#3)] 此示例将合并两个路径以创建格式正确的路径。This example combines two paths to create a properly formatted path. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 此示例返回`C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`。This example returns `C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`.

exception.span: 或 是格式不正确的路径。

summary.span: 将一个目录复制到另一个目录中。

span.span: Copies a directory to another directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法复制目录的内容以及目录本身。This method copies the contents of the directory as well as the directory itself. 如果目标目录不存在，则创建它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果在目标位置存在具有相同名称的目录，这两个目录的内容合并。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 操作期间可为此目录指定新名称。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 复制目录内的文件时，可能会引发异常导致由特定的文件。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 当引发此类异常时，它们被合并为单个异常其`Data`属性的形式保存一些条目在其中文件或目录路径是键和中包含的特定异常消息相应的值。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用`For…Each`用于循环访问项。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |复制目录Copy a directory|[如何：将一个目录复制到另一个目录How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例将复制目录`TestDirectory1`到`TestDirectory2`，覆盖现有文件。The following example copies the directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 替换`C:\TestDirectory1`和`C:\TestDirectory2`替换路径和你想要复制的目录以及你想要将其复制的位置的名称。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

summary.span: 将一个目录复制到另一个目录中。

span.span: Copies a directory to another directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法复制目录的内容以及目录本身。This method copies the contents of the directory as well as the directory itself. 如果目标目录不存在，则创建它。If the target directory does not exist, it is created. 如果在目标位置存在具有相同名称的目录，这两个目录的内容合并。If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged. 操作期间可为此目录指定新名称。You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation. 复制目录内的文件时，可能会引发异常导致由特定的文件。When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file. 当引发此类异常时，它们被合并为单个异常其`Data`属性的形式保存一些条目在其中文件或目录路径是键和中包含的特定异常消息相应的值。When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value. 使用`For…Each`用于循环访问项。Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyDirectory` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |复制目录Copy a directory|[如何：将一个目录复制到另一个目录How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)| ## Examples 下面的示例将复制目录`TestDirectory1`到`TestDirectory2`，覆盖现有文件。The following example copies the directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 替换`C:\TestDirectory1`和`C:\TestDirectory2`替换路径和你想要复制的目录以及你想要将其复制的位置的名称。Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CopyFile` 不保留 Ace （访问控制项）。`CopyFile` does not preserve ACEs (Access Control Entries). 新创建的文件默认 Ace 继承在其中创建的目录。The newly created file inherits default ACEs from the directory in which it is created. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.CopyFile` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将文件复制到相同的目录。Copy a file to the same directory.|[如何：在同一目录中创建文件副本How to: Create a Copy of a File in the Same Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-create-a-copy-of-a-file-in-the-same-directory.md)| |将文件复制到不同的目录。Copy a file to a different directory.|[如何：在不同的目录中创建文件的副本How to: Create a Copy of a File in a Different Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-create-a-copy-of-a-file-in-a-different-directory.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件复制`Test.txt`到目录`TestFiles2`而不会覆盖现有文件。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` without overwriting existing files. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 将替换为要在代码中使用的路径的文件路径。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code. 此示例将文件复制`Test.txt`到目录`TestFiles2`并将它重命名`NewFile.txt`。This example copies the file `Test.txt` to the directory `TestFiles2` and renames it `NewFile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#16)] 将替换为要在代码中使用的路径的文件路径。Replace the file paths with the paths you want to use in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CurrentDirectory` 是一个系统范围的环境变量。`CurrentDirectory` is a system-wide environment variable. ## Examples 此示例返回当前目录，并将其显示在一个消息框。This example returns the current directory and displays it in a message box. remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例删除目录`OldDirectory`只有当它为空。The example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` only if it is empty. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#56)] 此示例将删除目录`OldDirectory`和所有内容。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#57](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#57)] 此示例将删除目录`OldDirectory`及其所有内容，要求用户确认删除，但不会发送到的内容**回收站**。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents, asking the user to confirm the deletion, but does not send the contents to the **Recycle Bin**. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#58](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#58)] 此示例将删除目录`OldDirectory`和所有内容，发送到**回收站**，但不显示操作进度。This example deletes the directory `OldDirectory` and all of its contents, sending them to the **Recycle Bin**, but does not show the progress of the operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类驱动器进行建模，并提供方法和属性，以查询有关驱动器的信息。The class models a drive and provides methods and properties to query for drive information. 使用来确定哪些驱动器可用，以及它们是哪种类型的驱动器。Use to determine what drives are available, and what type of drives they are. 你还可以查询属性来确定容量和可用空间的驱动器上。You can also query the property to determine the capacity and available free space on the drive. ## Examples 此示例获取C 驱动器的对象并使用它来显示与驱动器有关的信息。This example obtains a object for the C drive and uses it to display information about the drive. span.span: Moves a file to a new location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标结构不存在，则创建它。If the target structure does not exist, it is created. `MoveFile`方法保留 Ace （访问控制项），仅当在移动文件相同的卷。The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume. 这包括继承的 Ace，后者将成为直接 Ace 移动 （直接 Ace 优先于继承的 Ace）。This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs). 如果卷之间移动文件，将不会复制 Ace。If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.MoveFile` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |移动文件Move a file|[如何：移动文件How to: Move a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-move-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件移动`Test.txt`从`TestDir1`到`TestDir2`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#86](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#86)] 此示例将文件移动`Test.txt`从`TestDir1`到`TestDir2`并将它重命名`Test2.txt`。This example moves the file `Test.txt` from `TestDir1` to `TestDir2` and renames it `Test2.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#87](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#87)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `OpenTextFileWriter`方法打开和初始化文件流，然后返回该流的对象。The `OpenTextFileWriter` method opens and initializes a stream for a file and then returns the object for that stream. 可以根据需要多次流写入并完成后关闭它。You can write to the steam as many times as necessary and then close it when you are finished. > [!NOTE] > 必须调用方法对象以确保所有数据正确都写入基础流。You must call the method on the object to make sure that all data is correctly written to the underlying stream. 如果只有少量的字符串写入文件，则可能是使用简单得多方法。If you are writing only a few strings to a file, it might be simpler to use the method. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将文本写入的文件 `StreamWriter`Write text to a file with a `StreamWriter`|[如何：使用 StreamWriter 向文件中写入文本How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)| ## Examples 此示例打开与`My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter`方法并使用它来将字符串写入的文本文件`WriteLine`方法`StreamWriter`类。This example opens a with the `My.Computer.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter` method and uses it to write a string to a text file with the `WriteLine` method of the `StreamWriter` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 `ReadAllText` 对象的 `My.Computer.FileSystem` 方法，可以读取文本文件。The `ReadAllText` method of the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object allows you to read from a text file. 文件的内容作为字符串返回。The contents of the file are returned as a string. 文件编码可以是指定文件的内容是否采用如 ASCII 或 utf-8 的编码。The file encoding can be specified if the contents of the file are in an encoding such as ASCII or UTF-8. 如果您正在读取包含扩展字符的文件，则需要指定文件编码使用的另一个重载方法。If you are reading from a file with extended characters, you need to specify the file encoding using another overload of the method. 不要根据文件的名称来判断文件的内容。Do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the name of the file. 例如，文件 Form1.vb 可能不是 Visual Basic 源文件。For example, the file Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. 在应用程序中使用输入的数据之前，需验证所有的输入内容。Verify all inputs before using the data in your application. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.ReadAllText` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从文本文件读取Read from a text file|[如何：读取文本文件How to: Read from Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例的内容读取`Test.txt`读入一个字符串，然后在消息框中显示内容。This example reads the contents of `Test.txt` into a string and then displays it in a message box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的路径，不包括文件名，不是有效，将引发异常。If the specified path, excluding the file name, is not valid, a exception will be thrown. 如果路径有效，但该文件不存在，则创建该文件。If the path is valid but the file does not exist, the file is created. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllBytes`方法打开文件，向其中写入，，然后关闭它。The `WriteAllBytes` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用代码`WriteAllBytes`方法是比使用代码的更简单对象。Code that uses the `WriteAllBytes` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 但是，如果要将数据添加到使用循环，对文件对象能够提供更好的性能，因为你只需打开和关闭文件一次。However, if you are adding data to a file using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file once. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllBytes`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllBytes` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |写入二进制文件Write to a binary file|[如何：写入二进制文件How to: Write to Binary Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-to-binary-files.md)| ## Examples 本示例将附加的数据数组`CustomerData`文件`CollectedData`。This example appends the data array `CustomerData` to the file `CollectedData`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的 utf-8 编码进行写入到文件。The UTF-8 encoding is used to write to the file. 若要指定不同的编码，使用的不同重载方法。To specify a different encoding, use a different overload of the method. 如果指定的文件不存在，则会创建一个。If the specified file does not exist, it is created. 如果指定的编码与现有文件的编码不匹配，则忽略指定的编码。If the specified encoding does not match the existing encoding of the file, the specified coding is ignored. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllText`方法打开文件，向其中写入，，然后关闭它。The `WriteAllText` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用代码`WriteAllText`方法是比使用代码的更简单对象。Code that uses the `WriteAllText` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 但是，如果你要通过使用循环，将字符串添加到文件对象能够提供更好的性能，因为你只需打开和关闭文件一次。However, if you are adding strings to a file by using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file one time. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将文本写入文件Write text to a file|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files.md)| |向文件中追加文本Append text to a file|[如何：向文本文件追加内容How to: Append to Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-append-to-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例将行`"This is new text to be added."`文件`Test.txt`，覆盖该文件中的任何现有文本。This example writes the line `"This is new text to be added."` to the file `Test.txt`, overwriting any existing text in the file. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 此示例将中的文件的名称`Documents and Settings`文件夹`FileList.txt`，插入一个回车符返回之间每次都提高可读性。This example writes the names of the files in the `Documents and Settings` folder to `FileList.txt`, inserting a carriage return between each for better readability. span.span: File to be written to.
Text to be written to file.

param.name: append
param.span: 要追加到文件的内容中，则为 ；要覆盖文件的内容，则为 。

span.span: to append to the contents of the file; to overwrite the contents of the file.
Default is .

param.span: 写入文件时要使用的编码。

span.span: What encoding to use when writing to file.
Default is UTF-8.

summary.span: 向文件写入文本。

span.span: Writes text to a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的文件不存在，则会创建一个。If the specified file does not exist, it is created. 如果指定的编码与现有文件的编码不匹配，则忽略指定的编码。If the specified encoding does not match the existing encoding of the file, the specified coding is ignored. > [!NOTE] > `WriteAllText`方法打开文件，向其中写入，，然后关闭它。The `WriteAllText` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it. 使用代码`WriteAllText`方法是比使用代码的更简单对象。Code that uses the `WriteAllText` method is simpler than code that uses a object. 但是，如果你要通过使用循环，将字符串添加到文件对象能够提供更好的性能，因为你只需打开和关闭文件一次。However, if you are adding strings to a file by using a loop, a object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file one time. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |将文本写入文件Write text to a file|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files.md)| |向文件中追加文本Append text to a file|[如何：向文本文件追加内容How to: Append to Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-append-to-text-files.md)| ## Examples 此示例将行`"This is new text to be added."`文件`Test.txt`，覆盖该文件中的任何现有文本。This example writes the line `"This is new text to be added."` to the file `Test.txt`, overwriting any existing text in the file. [!code-vb[VbRefFile#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefFile/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 此示例将中的文件的名称`Documents and Settings`文件夹`FileList.txt`，插入一个回车符返回之间每次都提高可读性。This example writes the names of the files in the `Documents and Settings` folder to `FileList.txt`, inserting a carriage return between each for better readability.
